participant_1.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

participant_2.background:
I eat my feelings.
I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best.
i like spreading laughter and love everywhere i go.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

content.text: Hello there! It's going well, thanks for asking. How about yours?
It's going well, thanks. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to write, and I'm working on a series of children's books. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That's great! What kind of books do you like to write?
I like to write fairytales, because I love the idea of creating a world where anything is possible. I also like to write stories that make people laugh and smile.
That's so cool! I love fairytales too. They're so imaginative and inspiring.
Thanks! I'm glad you like them.
That's a tough question. I think I would have to say "The Little Mermaid". I love the story of a young woman who is willing to give up everything to be with the man she loves.
That's a great choice. It's a classic for a reason.
I'm sure your fairytales will be just as great.
I'm sure they will be. You seem like a very talented writer.
